channel.title: NextOra - Campus Platform Updates
channel.description: Latest updates, features, and news from NextOra - the unified campus platform for IIT Sri Lanka students

item.title: NextOra Beta Launch - Join 500+ Early Users
item.dc:creator: NextOra Team
item.description: NextOra is now in beta! Join 500+ IIT students who are already experiencing a smarter campus life with our unified platform.
item.content:encoded:
We're excited to announce that NextOra is now in beta! Our unified campus platform brings together everything IIT Sri Lanka students need:

  • Real-time timetables and exam schedules
  • AR-powered campus navigation
  • Kuppi sessions for peer tutoring
  • Event discovery and ticket booking
  • Lost & found with AI matching
  • And much more!

Sign up now with your IIT credentials at nextora.lk

item.title: Introducing AR Campus Navigation
item.dc:creator: NextOra Team
item.description: Never get lost on campus again! Our new AR navigation feature helps you find lecture halls, labs, and facilities with augmented reality guidance.

item.title: Kuppi Sessions Now Live
item.dc:creator: NextOra Team
item.description: Connect with peers for tutoring sessions. Share knowledge, help others, and excel together as a community with our new Kuppi Sessions feature.
